name: Lone Pong
description:
It's the first online dating experience for Synthia and she matches with a guy named Roland. But soon enough, Synthia finds that Roland is out of her world.

It's up to you to keep their online conversation going on as long as it can be, through a game of pong.

---

Experience the struggle of keeping a conversation with a stranger! Immerse yourself in a dialogue about life, love, and other important stuffs!

And play it all as a ping-pong conversation simulation where you control both racket to keep the ball inside the field.

Let's see how long you can keep it.
